name: roytang
text: @alcinnz I dont think anyone is proposing to remove the module-level version numberss for the specific standards, rather to package the most commonly supported changes under a new monicker? It should be simpler for https://odysseus.adrian.geek.nz/ to list "CSS4" instead of individual module version numbers? Anyway, I only shared the link because I thought the discussion was interesting; the idea of having a "version" purely for marketing to nontech people, while everything still works the same way for devs
